channel.title: Comments on: “Good” Stories in Translation
channel.description: Critical Collaboration on the Middle East, South Asia, and Africa

item.title: By: Mahmoud Heidarian Vancouver BC

item.description: whoah this blog is excellent i love reading your articles. Keep up the great work! You know, a lot of people are searching around for this information, you could aid them greatly.
